introduction: Every day Evoulos manages to paw some women who use the Athens mass transit system. He has relegated his passsion to science. He gives a young friend of his theoretical and practical lessons which the latter enthusiastically hastens to put to good use with dire results. He sends a young girl to hospital while he ends up in jail. Through his friend Evoulos sees the criminal side of his behaviour and awaits retribution. But instead of punishment and despite the fact that he is now nearing forty, young love catches up with him for the first time. A woman who never speaks and meets him only on buses.
